title: Large-Scale Expert Course on Sexuality Education Instructional Design for Adolescents with Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of sex education and understanding of disabilities, fundamental principles of instructional design
context.additional_context: A customized instructional design competency-building course for developing sex education programs for adolescents with disabilities. Emphasizing practical training using VR simulations

learning_goals: Establishment of three or more personalized learning objectives reflecting learner characteristics analysis when designing sex education programs for youth with disabilities.
Development of two or more disability-type-specific sex education contents applying instructional design principles (ADDIE model).
Conducting two or more evaluation and revision feedback sessions for sex education scenarios in a VR simulation environment.

Within one week, learners can complete one set of youth-targeted sex education teaching materials (3 themes, 10 PPT slides + 1 activity sheet per theme) via project-based assessment. They must achieve an "excellent" rating in four out of five institutional rubric criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
